about_the_game:
Supporter Pack is a bundle for those who want to contribute to the development of Quasimorph! By purchasing this pack, you are supporting us and helping the game to continue evolving.

What can we offer you in return?

  • Unique Magnum skin: Your PMC base will now have a distinctive appearance that sets you apart from the competition!
  • 3 Pre-Release versions of the game with unique narrative content and missions: Exordium Demo, End of Dream Prologue, Demo 2023.
  • Digital soundtrack: 9 tracks from our team. We will keep adding new tracks here as the game updates.
  • High-resolution arts
  • A printable T-shirt design file
In the future, we will be adding more tracks, new art, and much more to this pack!
Thank you for your support!

name: Quasimorph - Supporter Pack
short_description: If you enjoyed the game and want to support our team, purchasing this pack is the best way to express yourself!
supported_languages: English, Russian, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil
